trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Utica
There were no other sightings in Utica on or around August 14th 2013
Summary: Red-Orange oval object traveling NW to NE at a high rate of speed with no discernable sound or propulsion noise.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 2030 on 8-15-13 my Wife & I were watching TV on our front three season porch. when my Wife looked up and said what the heck is that. We ran outdoors and watched this bright red-orange oval object just under cloud cover traveling at a rate of speed I would estimate to be relevant to our Space Station. It was traveling NW to NE in a straight line and visible for a full 5.5 minutes until it disappeared in the distance. Had this object been much higher We would have thought it to be a satellite, with refection from the sun which had recently set. This object was way to low and moving way too fast & eerily quiet....
